name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Whippy - All in One Communication Platform

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click to text from webpage, CRM or ATS.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Whippy is an all in one communication platform for teams. With our chrome extension you can send messages, create campaigns and trigger sequences from any website, CRM or ATS.
